item.description:
The next meeting of the March 21 Mobilization Committee – Eastern Mass will be Wednesday, 11 March 2009, 7:00 PM. The day has been changed to avoid conflicting with
Dahr Jamail's "Iraq Uncensored" talk in Dorchester.

JOIN US for the next planning meeting!
March 11, 2009 7:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, fifth floor
Boston, MA

Buses are being organized from the Greater Boston area to go down to DC.

They will be leaving late Friday evening March 20th for DC and leaving DC in the evening after the march and rally on March 21th, returning to Boston early Sunday morning. Tickets are $50 and can be purchased below. Subsidized seats will be available for students, people with low-income, and the unemployed. Checks can be made out to the Greater Boston Stop the Wars Coalition, mailed to 33 Harrison Ave., 5th floor, Boston, MA 02111. Please note how many tickets, best location to get on the bus (Boston/Cambridge,etc.). Please provide contact information including phone number(s) and e-mail address.

Please reserve a spot on the bus ASAP.
item.name: March 21 Mobilization Committee – Eastern Mass meeting
